Name: NecroFarm
About the game: NecroFarm is a casual minion defense game that's part farming and part tower defense. Defend your farm from waves of night creatures that come in all directions from the surrounding forest. Use your farming tools to plant and grow crops and then use necromancy to turn them into your unholy minions! Features: Necromancer-inspired gameplay. Summon and command unholy plant minions. Gain new minions and grow your army size. Tactical wave-based survival runs to get a high score . Atmospheric and spooky environment. Tips: Hold left mouse button to move. Right click on an enemy to command nearby minions to attack it. Grow minions around the farmhouse. Your minions will only patrol a small area where they were raised.
